code: import React,{createContext,useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SeriesContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const SeriesProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[allSeries,setSeriesList]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchSeries=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch('/api/series');const json=await res.json();setSeriesList(json.data||[]);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching series:',err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchSeries();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SeriesContext.Provider,{value:{allSeries,loading},children:children});};export const useSeries=()=>useContext(SeriesContext);
